pullRequest.title: SONARJAVA-3223 S5122 should support CorsRegistry from Spring

nodes.bodyText: You can use ExpressionUtils.methodName(mit) for that.

I don't see the interest of such complicated methods to tests this. Keep the test case minimal to what we really tests.  For instance, invocations of allowedMethods, allowCredentials, etc. are not related to the behavior of the rule.

commit.message: SONARJAVA-3223 S5122 should support CorsRegistry from Spring

beforeCommit.message: SONARJAVA-3103 S5122 should support CorsRegistry from Spring
